excellencies

at the outset
I congratulate you Mr President
on your election

full support

predecessor

during these challenging times

we have just come out after covid-19

diminished

we have faced a number of intersecting
crises
from the at first impact of climate

from sustainable development

their perspective

but I also want to highlight
our opportunities

we are now in an era of global boiling
we need a fast acting mandatory approach

the best environmental agreement

with three degrees Celsius being a very

determined contributions
as part of this Global stock take
in order to get us on a 5.5 degrees

with a strong call for action
in light with the statement in line with
the statement Micronesia strongly
implores
all parties to the Paris agreement

ipcc
as part of this effort countries should

from their Industrial Products and

which together could result in the

it has fought ambitions

by 2050 my position will achieve a net
zero
this full pledge will resolve in a
healthier happier and climate resilient

the climate crisis is indeed impacting
Health security

we reiterate our call for the
appointment

we also call for the full

it is time for those most responsible

for the cost of not doing so is far

Quantified
additionally Micronesia is brought to

underscore the right that this Riot is a

Climate crisis
we need all available tools to fight the

for this reason my pleasure is proud to

of a resolution requesting an advisory

countries like mine
and people like mine are the front lines

but we don't need more premises what we

as Islanders resilience in is in our DNA
but let me remind
you that our resilience
should not be a play Soldier for

the ocean is suffering from multiple

as for the sake of the ocean itself

it is also committed to implementing it
this is why I am honored to have been

agreement
which I did yesterday on behalf of

possible
we also commit to doing our part in

challenge
blue Prosperity Micronesia and similar

the 2030 agenda is at its halfway point
we are not on track

action oriented

including our internet connectivity can

available at every outlying Island
and our transportation can be more

if your only means of Transport is our

it is my hope that practical action will

Micronesia is a proud matrilineal
Society
where our Clans lineage and land control

this symbolizes the powerful role of
women in our culture and Society
yet we recognize
that historically women have had

so Mr President

I am pleased to report that finally
finally there are women members

we must find ways to put an end to this

this brings me to a related and most
crucial
point the reform of the U.N security

the security Council has begun archaic

challenges of our contemporary world
which are much more complicated

permanent membership of the security

these changes are needed in order to

for Security Council
is now

of us
our Global communities interpreted
